question:
Can the chest X-ray confirm the stability or progression of the noted spine deformity? Please choose from the following two options: [yes, no]
<image>
answer: No (X-rays cannot confirm stability or progression without comparing them to previous X-rays. Also, the report only indicates the present state, not changes over time.)
